title: SR and LR impacts of increased demand in perf comp

content.question: Assume that a firm that produces a good in a constant-cost perfectly competitive industry is in long-run equilibrium. If the demand for the good increases, the profit-maximizing output by the firm will change in which of the following ways in the short run and long run?
